title: Portillo the Wiener Dog Bites a Butt
description:
Get 10 percent off your BarkBox Subscription: http://www.barkbox.com/gameovergreggy

Catch up on The GameOverGreggy Show...

Full Episode Friday! Get it EARLY here! http://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody it's me Greg Miller alongside the star of The GameOverGreggy Show Portillo my 9-year-old wiener dog who I just love more than anything in the whole wide world and he's so cute in his new bow tie his mama got him of course this is another BarkBox unboxing what's BarkBox it's boxes like this every month they'll send you one you subscribe for it over at barkbox.com/gameovergreggy that gets you 10% off uh they send you a box full of treats and sometimes toys and your dog will learn to flip out at it just like mine has he already knows from just the sight of the box and the fact that he's on The GameOverGreggy table that's something's about to happen and he's trying to be very good and he's doing a good job uh this month they sent us the large box you can see the difference between the small one Pell got last time and the large one he got this time which should be for larger dogs but I don't think he'll care too much get in there Portillo what's in there what's all in
